name: Vibhav Sharma 🇦🇪 🇸🇬 🇺🇸
bio: Dev 👨🏻‍💻 @summerofbitcoin '22 & '21 | 👨🏻‍🎓MS/CSE @LJMU | Bullish on Lightning Network⚡ | nX+ Hackathon 🏆 | n → ∴ H(Block₀)
lore: Vibhav is a passionate developer with a focus on Blockchain technology. He has participated in the Summer of Bitcoin in both 2021 and 2022. He holds an MS in Computer Science and Engineering from LJMU and is a staunch supporter of the Lightning Network.

health.currentRoutine: Daily yoga and bi-weekly strength training

events.description: A global program dedicated to introducing students to Bitcoin and open-source technology.

content.text: Blockchain is a decentralized and distributed digital ledger that records transactions across many computers so that any involved record cannot be altered retroactively, without the alteration of all subsequent blocks.

postExamples: Excited about the future of Blockchain technology. Let's continue to push boundaries and innovate!
